name: TalkboTrinityExercise
0:
”Alexa open trinity exercise”
”ask trinity exercise”
”start trinity exercise”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trinity exercise
des: This skill is for TEFL teachers to help with listening and comprehension of English stories. This will be especially useful to non-native English teachers, who want to teach their students to listen to native English and respond clearly and accurately.
